document_title: Numbness of limbs: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Normally, doctors will make a diagnosis based on clinical symptoms and imaging to find abnormal signs. Some commonly prescribed methods include:
X-ray; CT computed tomography; MRI resonance imaging; Electromyography measures muscle strength
The results of paraclinical examination combined with clinical symptoms will be the basis for doctors to accurately diagnose the cause and severity of the disease, thereby providing the most appropriate treatment method.
